AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Pioneering smart logistics solutions at the border.
AboutPage.missionText: Our mission is to provide transparent, efficient, and sustainable logistics solutions, breaking down trade barriers and connecting Vietnamese businesses with the world. Our vision is to become the leading provider of 'Smart Border Logistics' in the region.

timeline.y2025: Established Quang Minh Joint Stock Company. Began construction of the logistics center at Tà Lùng Border Gate.
timeline.y2026: Officially commenced operations. Successfully implemented a smart shipment tracking system.
timeline.y2027: Expanded to Trà Lĩnh Border Gate, increasing total warehouse space to 100,000 m².

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: We are always ready to listen. Connect with Quang Minh through the details below or send us your request via the contact form.

faq.q1: What are the company's working hours?
faq.a1: Our office operates from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday. However, our border gate operations team works 24/7 to ensure continuous cargo clearance.
faq.q2: How can I track my shipment?
faq.a2: You can use the Air Waybill (AWB) number provided to track your shipment directly on our website via the 'Track Shipment' section on the homepage or by visiting the Tracking page.
faq.q3: Does Quang Minh provide services for Less than Container Load (LCL)?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer comprehensive services for both Full Container Load (FCL) and Less than Container Load (LCL) across borders.
